item.description:
@vipersniper100 wrote:

Ok, so i was following this tutorial http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,204546.new.html#new

[code] newWelc();
//openWelcomeScreen(201, false, 3, (127
<< 24)+1, misc.random(10));

GetBonus();

muted = 0;
else
muted = 1;
if(playerRights >= 0) {
sendMessage(“Welcome to War Scape.use ::starter and char on emote tab to begin your adverture!”);

sendMessage("::skillcapes tells you how to get skillcapes!!");

}

SendWeapon((playerEquipment[playerWeapon]),
GetItemName(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]));

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = " “;
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(”"))
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “”;
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “”;
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“void army”))
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Void Army is teh Sex kay?”;
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = " “;
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(”"))
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = " ";[/code]
